item.title: Design Consult
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
We'll be in touch within 2 business days to book your design consultation!

During our chat, we’ll go on zoom and answer any questions you have and through your Pinterest inspo. We will also give you a “recipe” of how to create your DIY vision!

Before our chat, we'll need to know the following information

  • Wedding date
  • Location
  • Link to pinterest board inspo
  • Budget
  • Rough idea of what you're planning on creating (i.e. arch/mason jar centerpieces)
  • Flowers you love/flowers you hate

Can't wait to chat!

The post Design Consult appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Design Consult

$35.00

We’ll be in touch within 2 business days to book your design consultation!

During our chat, we’ll go on zoom and answer any questions you have and through your Pinterest inspo. We will also give you a “recipe” of how to create your DIY vision!

Before our chat, we’ll need to know the following information

  • Wedding date
  • Location
  • Link to pinterest board inspo
  • Budget
  • Rough idea of what you’re planning on creating (i.e. arch/mason jar centerpieces)
  • Flowers you love/flowers you hate

Can’t wait to chat!

item.title: Natural Slender Pampas Grass
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Natural Slender Pampas Grass appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Shop

Natural Slender Pampas Grass

$25.00

Natural Slender Pampas Grass

$25.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Dried Products
Dried Flower Details

Delicate, slender, and dainty, this pampas grass is perfect for adding to fresh or dried flower bouquets, flower arrangements, wedding decorations, and home decor. This type of pampas has minimal shedding.

Size:

  • Plume 6.5” – 11” (16-28 cm)
  • Total Length: 70 – 75cm /stem
  • 50 grams (18-20 pieces/bundle)

Color:

  • Natural (reddish/burgundy/brown mix)
  • White/Cream

Pricing:

  • Per bundle

Package:

  • Vase not included
Dried Flower Care
  • When you receive your product, shake the stems gently outside to fluff the plumes.
  • Your pampas is likely to become compressed during shipping, take it outside and use a hot blow drier to re-fluff it.
  • This species has minimal shedding, but it will shed a bit when moved/blow-dried.
  • Handle with care as dried flowers are fragile.
  • Store stems upright.
  • Keep stems out of direct sunlight.
  • Refrain from getting stems wet.
  • Dried flowers are low maintenance and require very little care. Gently shake off dust occasionally to keep looking beautiful!
  • Gently separate stems when unpacking, as delicate stems can be prone to breakage.

Related products

  • Wheat – White

    $35.00

  • Amaranthus

    $40.00

  • Bunny Tails – White

    $20.00

  • White/Cream Slender Pampas Grass

    $25.00

The post Natural Slender Pampas Grass appeared first on You Floral.

item.title: Burgundy Roses – Spray
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Burgundy Roses – Spray appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Shop

Burgundy Roses – Spray

$45.00

Burgundy Roses – Spray

$45.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Categories: Bulk Flowers, Roses – Spray Tags: Burgundy, Filler Flower, Volume Flower
Flower Details

Overview

  • These blooms are known for their versatility and range of beautiful colours.
  • Each stem has approximately 3-5 mini roses.
  • Spray roses add beautiful texture to classic rose bouquets and are a lovely accent with any other style of arrangement.
  • Some of the blooms will remain closed, which adds a unique texture to your bouquets.

Number of Stems

  • 10 stems per bunch, approximately 3-5 blooms per stem.

Flower Design Type

  • Volume/Filler
Flower Care

For general flower care and unpacking instructions, visit our blog post here

Specific Flower Care
  • These are a “cluster” flower, within the cluster you might see a small sub-stem with no bloom on it…that’s normal, just cut that stem off!
  • Spray roses arrive closed bloom, they take a day or two to open up!
Quantity Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for including spray roses in your arrangements:

  • Bridal Bouquet: 5-7 stems
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet: 3-5 stems
  • Boutineers: 1 stem
  • Corsages: 1-2 stems
  • Centerpieces: 4-5 stems
  • Large Arrangements: 15-20 stems
Product Video

Related products

  • Pink Aster Matsumoto

    $30.00

  • Limonium

    $27.00

  • Babies Breath

    $30.00

  • Purple Aster Matsumoto

    $30.00

The post Burgundy Roses – Spray appeared first on You Floral.

item.title: Purple Snapdragons
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Purple Snapdragons appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Shop

Purple Snapdragons

$30.00

Purple Snapdragons

$30.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Categories: Bulk Flowers, Snapdragons Tags: Line flower, Purple
Flower Details

Overview

  • Snapdragons are great for large arrangements, given their tall size and have great presence.
  • They are a lovely option for upright wildflower-style bouquets and centrepieces.
  • Available in a wide range of beautiful shades and colours.
  • Their long spender stalks have blossoms from top to bottom, they’re often used to add in height and diversity to arrangements.
  • Depending on the time of year, they are grown locally, or imported from overseas.

Number of Stems

  • 5 stems per bunch

Flower Design Type

  • Line Flower
Flower Care

For general flower care and unpacking instructions, visit our blog post here

Specific Flower Care
  • Be sure to remove all foliage carefully before putting into water.
  • Snaps tend to curve as gravity takes over, so make sure they are kept in a supportive vase until you arrange them.
  • Stems are tall and can be susceptible to bending – take care when opening and processing!
  • Lower buds may fade sooner than the rest of the stem – feel free to snip off individual buds to extend the life!
Quantity Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for quantities of snapdragons:

  • Bridal Bouquet: 3-5 stems
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet: 1 -3 stems
  • Boutineers: N/A too large
  • Corsages: N/A too large
  • Large Arrangements: 15-20 stem
Product Video

Related products

  • White Hydrangea

    $35.00

  • Sunset Leucadendron

    $25.00

  • White Alstromeria

    $30.00

  • Queen Anne’s Lace

    $25.00

The post Purple Snapdragons appeared first on You Floral.

item.title: Burgundy Mums – Pom Pom
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Burgundy Mums – Pom Pom appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Shop

Burgundy Mums – Pom Pom

$25.00

Burgundy Mums – Pom Pom

$25.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Categories: Bulk Flowers, Mums - Pom Pom Tags: Burgundy, Filler Flower, Volume Flower
Flower Details

Overview

  • Mums are long lasting, hardy, and versatile, available in so many colours!
  • Pom pom mums are super cute, like a button! A great choice for adding colour and texture to garden-style or wildflower bouquets.
  • These mums have multiple blooms per stem which can be separated to get the most out of your stems.
  • Mums do very well out of water for extended periods of time. Perfect for boutonnieres, tablescaping, or tucking into your garland for a beautiful pop of colour.
  • Colour and shape variation is natural and part of the joy of chrysanthemums
  • Check out the photos/videos to see what an average bunch size looks like.

Number of Stems

  • 10 stems per bunch

Flower Design Type

  • Volume/Filler flower
Flower Care

For general flower care and unpacking instructions, visit our blog post here

Specific Flower Care
  • Ensure all foliage is removed as mums are especially prone to rot if left in murky or leafy water.
  • Your bundles may arrive with some broken blooms – this is normal! Use these shorter blooms for bud vases, table scaping, or even boutonnieres!
  • These are a “cluster” flower, within the cluster you might see a small sub-stem with no bloom on it…that’s normal, just cut that stem off!
Quantity Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for quantities of pom pom mums:

  • Bridal Bouquet: 3 stems
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet: 1-2 stems
  • Boutineers: 1-2 blooms
  • Corsages: 2-3 blooms
  • Centerpieces: 3-5 stems
  • Large Arrangements: 15-20 stems
Product Video

Related products

  • Limonium

    $27.00

  • Pink Aster Matsumoto

    $30.00

  • Purple Aster Matsumoto

    $30.00

  • Orange Alstromeria

    $30.00

The post Burgundy Mums – Pom Pom appeared first on You Floral.

Dried Flower Care
  • Handle with care as dried flowers are fragile.
  • Store stems upright.

  • Gently separate stems when unpacking, as delicate stems can be prone to breakage.

item.content:encoded:
Home / Shop

Pink Pampas

$95.00

Pink Pampas

$95.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Dried Products
Dried Flower Details

Huge, fluffy, and luxurious; this pampas is sure to make a statement wherever you display it.

Size:

  • Plume length approx. 30”
  • Total length (including plume) approx. 44”

Color:

  • Cotton candle color pink (dyed)

Pricing:

  • Per bundle (5 stems/bundle)

Package:

  • Vase not included
Dried Flower Care
  • When you receive your product, shake the stems gently outside to fluff the plumes.
  • Your pampas is likely to become compressed during shipping, take it outside and use a hot blow drier to re-fluff it.
  • It’s normal that your pampas will shed when moved/blow-dried.
  • If you are nervous about shedding you can apply a light dusting of hairspray.
  • Handle with care as dried flowers are fragile.
  • Store stems upright.
  • Keep stems out of direct sunlight.
  • Refrain from getting stems wet.

  • Store stems upright.
  • Keep stems out of direct sunlight.
  • Refrain from getting stems wet.
  • Dried flowers are low maintenance and require very little care. Gently shake off dust occasionally to keep looking beautiful!
  • Gently separate stems when unpacking, as delicate stems can be prone to breakage.
